alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 10:22AM EDT until April 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Macon, Sumter and Dooly Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and extensive flood plain along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 26. The access road to Georges Boat Landing will be flooded at least 3 feet deep. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 8.2 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 23.9 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
